article_title: With 23andMe entering bankruptcy, here's how to delete your genetic data
summary: Genetic testing company 23andMe has filed for bankruptcy, raising privacy concerns about their genetic database potentially being sold. Experts advise caution and deleting genetic data due to possible misuse by bad actors. Users can delete their account and data to protect their privacy. It is noted that their data will not be used in future research projects, and personal samples will be discarded.
